original_text: Now Gaal son of Ebed had gone out and was standing at the entrance of the city gate just as Abimelek and his troops came out from their hiding place.
korean_text: 에벳의 아들 가알이 나와서 성읍 문 입구에 설 때에 아비멜렉과 그와 함께 있는 백성이 매복하였던 곳에서 일어난지라

sentences.original_text: Now Gaal son of Ebed had gone out
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 에벳의 아들 가알이 밖으로 나와 있었고

sentences.original_text: and was standing at the entrance of the city gate
just as Abimelek and his troops came out
sentences.korean_translation: 마침 아비멜렉과 그의 부대들이 나올 때였습니다
